lines: Hello! I'm Takeo Suzuki, the lead designer. My position has me overseeing the graphics for the entire game, which includes all the characters, animations, backgrounds, and cutscenes.
Thank you for coming to visit us here on the Eighteenth Floor! We love to hear from our players─your interest and support are always a source of enthusiasm and encouragement.
We want to meet all your expectations, and will keep coming up with interesting new equipment and dungeons! Let's enjoy this journey together!
